comments.description: Enter any notes or comments about the group here.
comments.name: comments

email.description: If this group has an address in your e-mail application, enter that address here.
email.name: email

groupName.description: Set the name of the group.
groupName.name: groupName

groupOwner.externalId.description: Select the owner of the group. You are selected as the owner by default. To allow only the owner to edit the group, check the Restrict Group Editing to Owner box.
groupOwner.externalId.name: groupOwner.externalId

groupOwner.internalId.description: Select the owner of the group. You are selected as the owner by default. To allow only the owner to edit the group, check the Restrict Group Editing to Owner box.
groupOwner.internalId.name: groupOwner.internalId

groupOwner.name.description: Select the owner of the group. You are selected as the owner by default. To allow only the owner to edit the group, check the Restrict Group Editing to Owner box.
groupOwner.name.name: groupOwner.name

isFunctionalTeam.description: Check this box to mark this group as a functional team.Functional teams can can be emailed copies of the issue from the Communication subtab on issue records. You may want to check this box for all product team groups and then create additional function team groups for other teams you want to email.
isFunctionalTeam.name: isFunctionalTeam

isInactive.description: When you check this box, you can no longer view this group's shared calendar and invite this group to events.This group also no longer appears in the Groups list unless you check the Show Inactives box at the bottom of the page.
isInactive.name: isInactive

isManufacturingWorkCenter.description: Check the Manufacturing Work Center box to enable this group to be used as a work center with routing records.
isManufacturingWorkCenter.name: isManufacturingWorkCenter

isPrivate.description: Set this field to true if you want only members of this group to be able to see the group's list of members.
isPrivate.name: isPrivate

isProductTeam.description: Check this box to mark this group as a product team.Product team groups can be selected in the Product Team field on issues. Product teams designate who is responsible for resolving an issue. Members of this team are emailed when an issue is first entered so that everyone is aware of the problem.
isProductTeam.name: isProductTeam

isSalesRep.description: Check this box to mark this group a sales group.On sales orders and customer records, sales groups are listed in the Sales Rep field. When you assign a sales territory, sales groups are listed in the Sales Rep. field.
isSalesRep.name: isSalesRep

isSupportRep.description: Set this field to True if the group is a support group. On case records, support groups are listed in the Assigned To field. When you assign a case territory, support groups are listed in the Support Rep. field.
isSupportRep.name: isSupportRep

issueRole.externalId.description: Select a role that corresponds to the role of this group’s members, and this group can be assigned to issues.
issueRole.externalId.name: issueRole.externalId

issueRole.internalId.description: Select a role that corresponds to the role of this group’s members, and this group can be assigned to issues.
issueRole.internalId.name: issueRole.internalId

issueRole.name.description: Select a role that corresponds to the role of this group’s members, and this group can be assigned to issues.
issueRole.name.name: issueRole.name

laborResources.description: Enter the number of labor resources associated with this work center.
laborResources.name: laborResources

machineResources.description: Enter the number of machine resources associated with this work center.
machineResources.name: machineResources

parentGroupType.value.description: This field shows the type of group you are creating, based on the link you clicked to open this page.
parentGroupType.value.name: parentGroupType.value

restrictionGroup.externalId.description: If you want to restrict the use of this group to members of a specific group, set that group here. If you restrict the use of this group, then this group cannot be made private.
restrictionGroup.externalId.name: restrictionGroup.externalId

restrictionGroup.internalId.description: If you want to restrict the use of this group to members of a specific group, set that group here. If you restrict the use of this group, then this group cannot be made private.
restrictionGroup.internalId.name: restrictionGroup.internalId

restrictionGroup.name.description: If you want to restrict the use of this group to members of a specific group, set that group here. If you restrict the use of this group, then this group cannot be made private.
restrictionGroup.name.name: restrictionGroup.name

savedSearch.externalId.description: Set this field to the saved search that returns the members of this group. In the UI you can created new saved searches by going to Lists > Search > Saved Searches.
savedSearch.externalId.name: savedSearch.externalId

savedSearch.internalId.description: Set this field to the saved search that returns the members of this group. In the UI you can created new saved searches by going to Lists > Search > Saved Searches.
savedSearch.internalId.name: savedSearch.internalId

savedSearch.name.description: Set this field to the saved search that returns the members of this group. In the UI you can created new saved searches by going to Lists > Search > Saved Searches.
savedSearch.name.name: savedSearch.name

workCalendar.externalId.description: Select a work calendar to associate with this work center.
workCalendar.externalId.name: workCalendar.externalId

workCalendar.internalId.description: Select a work calendar to associate with this work center.
workCalendar.internalId.name: workCalendar.internalId

workCalendar.name.description: Select a work calendar to associate with this work center.
workCalendar.name.name: workCalendar.name
